medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has had RUQ pain intermittently for the past month, mostly occurring after eating. The pain has acutely worsened over the past three days. Associated symptoms include some nausea but no emesis, with no changes in bladder or bowel habits. The patient has not experienced fevers or chills and denies prior episodes of such pain before the last month.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Ovarian cyst removal one month ago.
